features: EXTRA STRENGTH FOR EXTRA VOLUME: OGX Extra Strength Biotin & Collagen Shampoo is a volume-creating powerhouse with an extra helping of vitamins and proteins to pump up fine strands
LIGHTWEIGHT CLEANSING: Extra body doesn't mean extra weight with this thickening shampoo. It's an astonishingly lightweight blend that delivers deep clean, bold body, and incredible volume

BIOTIN FOR THE WIN: Biotin, aka vitamin B7, is crucial for skin, nail, and hair health. We paired it with Collagen, a protein known to be rich in amino acids, to make a beauty power blend that nourishes hair and helps deliver a full, healthy look

GO BIG AND GO OUT: Take your hair and hit the town with this extra strength thickening shampoo. Designed to fill your strands with life and body, OGX Extra Strength helps provide more volume than regular strength shampoo

INFUSED WITH GOODNESS: A premium ingredient blend infused with bamboo fiber extract and hydrolyzed wheat protein creates a color-safe plumping shampoo designed to nourish hair with everything it needs to look healthy and beautiful
Create the appearance of fuller, healthier hair *vs non-conditioning shampoo. For optimal results use the complete Extra Strength Biotin &Collagen collection of shampoo, conditioner, & oil
body.description: OGX Extra Strength Biotin & Collagen Shampoo is a volume-creating powerhouse with an extra helping of vitamins and proteins to pump up flat strands. Extra body doesn't mean extra weight with a thickening, sulfate-free surfactant blend of nourishing ingredients for full, voluminous hair. Biotin, or vitamin B7, is crucial for skin, nail, and hair health. Paired with collagen, this blend helps nourish hair for a full, healthy look. Be ready for a night out with extra strength conditioning designed to fill your strands with life and body. OGX Extra Strength helps provide more volume than regular strength shampoo, so show off those full strands! This premium ingredient blend infused with bamboo fiber extract and hydrolyzed wheat protein creates a color-safe plumping shampoo designed to nourish hair with everything it needs to look healthy and beautiful.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: We approach beauty in our own way, pure and simple. Originality inspires us, that’s why we love being different; from our exotic ingredients, to the shape of our bottles, to our quest for sustainability — we approach beauty in our own way. Biotin & Collagen Extra Strength Shampoo 13 oz The nutrient-rich, plump-it-up power of this haircare infused with Vitamin B7 biotin + collagen helps give each strand a beautiful boost. This dynamic duo will leave your hair feeling thicker, fuller and looking oh, so healthy. Nutrient rich volumizing shampoo Helps create the appearance of thicker hair Leaves hair looking full & voluptuous With Biotin, Collagen and Wheat Proteins Sulfate free surfactant hair care system

Benefits, Ingredients, Hair Type, Regimen Benefits Help thicken and texturize any hair type with just one use. This powerful formula helps volumize even the skinniest strands into fuller and more abundant looking locks. Ingredients An exclusive blend with Vitamin B7 biotin, collagen, and hydrolyzed wheat protein, helps to infuse nutrients into every strand and creates the appearance of thicker, fuller, healthier looking hair. Hair Type This product is good for everyday use, works well with most hair types. - Oily - Damaged - Color-Treated - Frizzy - Straight Regimen For best results, use our entire Biotin & Collagen collection to help infuse nutrients into every strand. After shampooing, we recommend our conditioner followed up with our treatment to help moisturize and plumpen strands without weighing them down.

OGX Biotin & Collagen Extra Strength Shampoo OGX Lightweight + Coconut Fine Curls Shampoo OGX Damage Remedy + Coconut Miracle Oil Extra Strength Shampoo OGX Extra Strength Argan Oil of Morocco Shampoo OGX 5-in-1 Benefits, Frizz Free + Keratin Smoothing Oil Shampoo OGX Extra Strength Refreshing Scalp + Teatree Mint Shampoo Recommended Hair Type Fine / Flat Hair Fine Curls / Wavy Hair Damaged / Weakened Hair Coarse or Dry Hair Frizz-Prone Hair All Hair Types Hair Goal Fuller-Looking, Healthier-Looking Hair Up to 5x Stronger* Up to 82% Less Breakage in one use* Up to 2x Softer & 2x Stronger + Shine* Tame Frizz, Humidity Protection, Strengthen + Shine Remove Scalp Buildup Without Stripping* Key Ingredient Biotin + Collagen + Bamboo Fiber Extract Coconut Water + Flaxseed Coconut Oil + Vanilla Bean Extract + Essence of Tiare Argan Oil + Silk Proteins Keratin Protein + Argan Oil + Ceramides Teatree Oil + Peppermint Extract + Witch Hazel Scent Bergamot, Jasmine + Vanilla Coconut, Jasmine + Peach Coconut Milk, Warm Vanilla + Tangerine Citrus with green floral & woody notes Golden Amber, Tropical Orange + Madagascar Vanilla Sweet Peppermint, Tea Tree + Iced Vanilla Contains Sulfates? No No No No No No

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Smells amazing. Not very conditioning but I still love it and use spray detangler after.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very helpful for my fine hair

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Made my scalp healthier
reviews.reviewText: This shampoo has both healthy and unhealthy things in it. I don't usually use anything that has very many ingredients that I can't pronounce, but I tried this last year when my hair was thinning at a frightening rate. It smells good and lathers nicely. Very slowly my hair started regrowing, and several odd irritations on my scalp started healing. My hair never has and never will be thick. I did not expect miracles, so I was just glad when some hair started filling in. My only explanation is that the vitamins and protein it contains improved my scalp enough for viable hair roots to function again. Over the years I have noticed that B vitamins and eating more protein did help somewhat. This is why I thought maybe applying them directly to my scalp might be helpful. It seems that it is for me, so I just grit my teeth and try to forget what else is in there. Just bought 2 more bottles while it was on sale.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars works for me!
reviews.reviewText: so i know this product has much controversy surrounding it but for me, personally, i have used this product for years and have great results. i’m 36 years old with naturally curly hair. after the birth of my child around 30 my hair became very frail and thin and was losing its curl. this product brought it back over time. it grew wonderfully and gave me back my confidence! but, in fact, at one point i regretfully stopped using it because of women saying it made them lose their hair so i was scared that would happen to me and it wasn’t before long that i started losing my gorgeous locks again when i switched products. so i started using it again and already my hair is fuller and stronger after about a month.the lesson here is no head of hair is created equal. what doesn’t work for one person can work for someone else. in addition to this i take collagen vitamins daily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars hair looks great
reviews.reviewText: We bought this for my husband and it is great. Hair looks wonderful

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars price is reasonable
reviews.reviewText: I have been using OGX Thick & Full + Biotin & Collagen Extra Strength Volumizing Shampoo for a few weeks and I like it so far. It has a nice scent and lathers well. It makes my hair feel thicker and fuller and does not weigh it down. I have noticed some improvement in my hair loss, but not a dramatic change. I think it is a good shampoo for adding volume and strength to thinning hair, but it may not be enough to stop hair loss completely. The price is reasonable for the quality and quantity of the product. I would recommend it to anyone who wants to boost their hair's volume and health.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love Conditioner, have fine hair works great. BUT halfway through bottle refused to pour. Took cap off, squeezed it, nothing have to throw out half bottle and I do my hair 4 times week.
